Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「幻の庭」<White>ってどんなところだと 思います、<Veigue>さん？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of place do you think the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White> is, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 普通の庭じゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Wouldn't it be a normal garden?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも<Cyan>「幻の庭」<White>ですよ？ 普通って事はないと思いますけど……
Entry.EnglishText: But it's the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>, is it not? I don't think it would be something ordinary...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……え？ あ、私？ ええと……普通の庭じゃないですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Huh? M-me? Um... Wouldn't it be a normal garden?

Entry.JapaneseText: 普通の庭って…… どんな庭なんですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: A normal garden... What would that even be?
